name: Hello Sunshine Invisible Sunscreen For Face SPF 50
about: What it is: A three-in-one daily face sunscreen that provides clear SPF 50, no white cast, and also works as your hydrating serum and skin-perfecting makeup primer...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles and Dryness..Ingredient Callouts: Free of oxybenzone. It is also vegan...What Else You Need to Know: This broad-spectrum sunscreen is your essential last step to skincare and first step to makeup. The invisible sunscreen with a light, fresh scent wears well under makeup and defends against UVA/UVB rays and external pollution. This lightweight formula delivers up to 48 hours of hydration and prevents the look of wrinkles and hyperpigmentation...Clinical Results: In a 1-week consumer study:.- 98% agree it leaves an invisible finish on skin and does not leave a white cast.- 98% agree skin feels instantly hydrated.- 95% agree it wears well under makeup
ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Homosalate, Octocrylene, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, C15-19 Alkane, Propanediol, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, C12-22 Alkyl Acrylate/Hydroxyethylacrylate Copolymer, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sclerotium Gum, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Glyceryl Stearate, Jojoba Esters, Parfum/Fragrance, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera/Sunflower Seed Wax, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, Taraxacum Officinale Rhizome/Root Extract-Dandelion.Rhizome/Root Extract, Citric Acid, Linalool, Polyglycerin-3, Limonene.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.On Bare Skin:.-Apply sunscreen generously and evenly 15 minutes before sun exposure..-Blend into skin..-Reapply every two hours....Layered Under Makeup:.-This product acts as the perfect makeup primer for a smooth, hydrated look.

reviews.review_title: The IT Cosmetics Hello Sunshine Invisible Sunscree
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The IT Cosmetics Hello Sunshine Invisible Sunscreen is a standout product with its SPF 50 protection. It feels incredibly lightweight on the skin and absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue, making it comfortable to wear all day. The sunscreen stays effective even through sweat and minor water exposure, providing reliable, lasting protection. The 1.7 oz size is perfect for portability, fitting easily into a purse or travel bag for convenient reapplication. Suitable for all skin types, it works well under makeup or on its own, making it a versatile addition to any skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for about 2 weeks now, and it is fabulous. I have combo skin, very sensitive. I've had no issues with breakouts, no white cast (granted, I'm a ghost), and it has no real scent to be bothered by. It applies as a lotion, very smooth, no tacky, sticky, or greasy residue. I wear both an oil-based serum and thicker moisturizer under this. No pilling or separation. Makeup wears beautifully on it. And then there's the GLOW: like, glassy, lit-from-within glow. I'm not talking about the grease-stain that some sunscreens turn you into. This isn't oily, it's not greasy, it doesn't start melting off your face in half an hour... it leaves the prettiest, healthiest glow, and if you top it off with a highlighter, you'll be beaming like a goddess all freaking day. And at no point in that day, will it dry you out. Truly lovely. 100% recommend.

It's the only thing i want to use to prime my face now. I am a medium to full coverage girlie and this wears so freaking beautifully under my foundation. It makes everything look so radiant but not greasy! The photo attached is with the product on my face before foundation. reviews.review_text: I have only been using SPF daily for the past 2 years, so I have not tried many options.  Out of the maybe 10 that I have tried, this is for sure in the top 2! I do layer this on top of my typical moisturizer, but I think that once warmer weather hits, I may be able to use it without a moisturizer.  This is a great option for daily use!

reviews.review_title: Great Skincare Solution for Eczema & Diverse skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for the past few weeks, and I'm really pleased with the results. As someone with eczema, I often struggle to find skincare products that don't irritate my sensitive skin. Additionally, as a person of color, it's a challenge to find products that don't leave my skin looking greasy or overly dry. This product manages to meet both of these needs effectively.  Firstly, the formula is gentle on the skin. It's hydrating without being too heavy or oily, which is a major win for anyone with eczema. I've noticed that it doesn't trigger any flare-ups or discomfort, which is a relief. It's so rare to find a product that feels like it's truly made with sensitive skin in mind.  Secondly, the product works well with my skin tone. It doesn't leave any unsightly greasy sheen, nor does it strip my skin of moisture, leaving it dry. This balance is crucial for maintaining healthy-looking skin that feels as good as it looks. The texture of the product is just right for everyday use, and it absorbs nicely, leaving a smooth, comfortable finish.  Overall, I give this product a thumbs up for both its gentleness on sensitive skin and its effectiveness in providing the right kind of hydration for people of color. It's comforting to find a product that I can rely on daily, which caters to my specific skin concerns without causing any additional problems. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who shares similar skin issues or concerns, as it's been a fantastic addition to my skincare routine.

Initially, as it was absorbing into the skin, it will look slightly greasy however, in a couple seconds it absorbs, and thereu2019s no greasiness there whatsoever. reviews.review_text: Thanks to IT Cosmetics for the free product in exchange for my review. This sunscreen has a runny consistency that is easy to spread; while it initially feels slightly greasy, it eventually dries to a natural finish with a fresh fragrance that's apparent upon initial application and lingers for a while. While I wouldn't say it feels like nothing, it does feel lightweight because it really is invisible and doesn't remain sticky or shiny after it settles on the skin. As it's true for most sunscreens, you have to apply an adequate/generous amount to get the SPF listed on the label, which means that I'll probably go through this 1.69 oz. squeeze tube quickly. Then again, it's small enough to throw in your bag and take with you when you need to reapply, so the small size could be a positive for you.   I used this under makeup and can see how this can be considered a primer, but that's mostly because it hydrates skin, doesn't pill, and doesn't interfere with foundation, but I wouldn't say it makes pores look smaller or help makeup last longer. I'd love this sunscreen if it didn't have such a strong fragrance, but think it's a nice option for someone looking for a chemical-based sunscreen with no white cast.

It's super light, very sheer and hydrating but doesn't have my skin oily at the end of the day. It didnt realize it was a good makeup primer too! My only issue is that I don't think it works well for sunscreen reapplication with makeup on. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the IT Cosmetics Hello Sunshine Invisible Sunscreen For Face SPF 50 and it has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. This product stands out because itu2019s truly invisible under makeup or on its own. What I absolutely adore about this sunscreen is the dewy finish it gives my skin, enhancing my complexion without leaving any white cast or greasy feeling.  The SPF 50 protection is robust, giving me confidence that my skin is well-protected against harmful UV rays throughout the day. Itu2019s lightweight, blends effortlessly, and doesnu2019t interfere with the application of my makeup. In fact, it acts almost like a primer, smoothing out my skin and leaving it looking radiant and moisturized.  Whether Iu2019m heading out for a full day of activities or just running errands, this sunscreen has been a reliable addition to my beauty arsenal. Itu2019s especially great for those who want high SPF protection without compromising on the aesthetic finish of their skin. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a sunscreen that combines strong protection with a beauty boost!

It felt very lightweight and in general, I sweat quite a bit with sunscreen but with this sunscreen it felt lightweight and I even forgot I had it on. I am loving it and I know this is a keeper because it is safe for our skin as well. I would happily share it with my kids as a parent. It absorbed so well into my skin.

reviews.review_text: I received this It Cosmetics Hello Sunshine Invisible Hydrating Serum Sunscreen complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. I find this serum sunscreen it a little too thick/moisturizing for my combo skin. Unfortunately for me it's not the finish I like for a makeup primer(I use a pore filling matte finish) so I won't use this for that use. I would prefer if it was unscented as the scent it gives off a strong department store perfume counter vibe and honestly I don't like a scented facial sunscreen. It is absolutely invisible so I will give it credit for that aspect! I would use purely for sun protection if I didn't have any other options but wouldn't seek it out for myself. I would recommend this for those with dry skin who are looking for extra hydration from a sunscreen that don't mind a dewy finish.

reviews.review_text: 1st off...I'm ASTONISHED by this product! I LOVE the It brand. I use many other products from the brand. I have sensitive dry/aging skin. (44ud83dude14)! Sunscreen is a must for my very light skin. Especially because I've had skin cancer concerns in my life. Unfortunately- most facial sunscreen products are far too aggravating for my eyes and skin. I almost found a winner last year. But- I'm not able to get past the thick feeling while on my face.  THIS PRODUCT doesn't irritate my eyes nor skin. It's EXTREMELY moisturizing! So much so- I'm able to walk out of the house without applying a facial moisturizer! It leaves a lit within glow without looking like a shimmering- glitter mess. It doesn't look greasy like most sunscreens. It does have a SLIGHT tacky feeling after dry down. Perfect for priming the skin for makeup. My most favorite part of the product is the HYDRATION!!! I'm incredibly soft even 18 hours after initial application. A lil tip... I'll apply it to my hands prior to getting into the car to help protect my hands while driving.  I'm so thankful to have received this product for an honest review. I honestly thought I'd never find my perfect facial sunscreen. And- now I have!

reviews.review_text: I love spending time outdoors, but finding a sunscreen that keeps up with me can be tricky. IT Cosmetics' Hello Sunshine Invisible Sunscreen SPF 50 is a game-changer.
